item.title: Cardano Founder Calls For “Decentralized Updates” Over Ledger Controversy | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
Crypto News: Amidst the intense controversy surrounding Ledger, a prominent hardware wallet manufacturer, and its contentious firmware update, which introduces a feature enabling users to back up their seed phrases by transmitting encrypted key fragments to third-party firms, renowned founder of Cardano, Charles Hoskinson, has stepped forward to share his perspective. item.title: Crypto News: New York AG Settles With Coin Cafe For $4.3 Million | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
The New York Attorney General Letitia James has secured the sum of $4.3 million from Coin Cafe, a Brooklyn-based digital currency service provider. According to the update from the Attorney General’s office, Coin Cafe was exploiting its customers for safeguarding their cryptocurrencies on dedicated accounts kept with the company’s wallet.
